page.topic: Alpha Five Printer is not Installed Error
page.description: The Amyuni printer driver can fail during the Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS installation if a previously unsigned driver was installed.

section.description: The Amyuni printer is distributed as part of the Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS installation. It is used to generate Reports. If the Amyuni printer fails to install, you cannot create Reports using Alpha Anywhere. This may manifest as an error message when you try to create a Report:

figure.title: Error message sent from the Report server if the Amyuni printer driver is missing

link.alt: Report did not print. Error reported was: 'Alpha Five Printer' (for creating PDF, RTF and HTMl output) is not installed. Re-install Alpha Anywhere Appication Server for IIS at line: 31

section.description: If Windows encounters an unsigned printer driver that was previously installed, an error may occur when attempting to install the Amyunit drivers. If the installer is not running in silent mode, the IIS installer will display the following message:

figure.title: Error installing Amyuni printer driver while installing Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS

link.alt: Error Configuring Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS. An unexpected error occurred while installing AmyUni printer driver.

section.description: If the installer for Alpha Anyhwere Application Server for IIS is run in silent mode, the error will be logged to the Windows Event log instead.

If no Windows Event log was created, check the *[installAmyuniPrinters.log]* file. You can find the *[installAmyuniPrinters.log]* inside the *[Amyuni5]* folder in the installation directory. For example, *[bold:C:\Program Files (x86)\A5V12 Application Server for IIS\Amyuni5]*. If an error occured during the installation of the Amyuni priner, it will be listed in the log file. For example:

section.title: Resolving Error Code 87
section.description: Before attempting to install the Amyuni printer, the DriverStore\FileRepository folder needs to be cleaned up. Follow the instructions on Amyuni's website, *[extlink:Invalid Parameters installing PDF Converter printer driver@https://www.amyuni.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=18&t=2824]*, to clean up the system
